headline: Stock Market Today: Small Caps Rise, Edging Dow; Travel Firms Jump On Oil Drop But Byrna, Axon Trip Sell Rules (Live Coverage)
summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average gained ground as metal, cyclical and financial stocks kept a bullish profile. But data-center and security software stocks got stung.

headline: Annette Slyman brings Global Marketing, Commercial and Operational Experience to Galacxia, Inc. as Chief Operating Officer of Life Backup Plan App
